Lux Home Group | Keller Williams Realty Phoenix

Lux Property Group is a full service real estate team with a history of excellence at Keller Williams Realty located in beautiful Chandler, Arizona. Our team members are driven to be role models in the real estate industry. We are dedicated to making the home buying and selling process as easy as possible for our clients all while educating them along the way! We want each client to have such a great experience they tell all of their friends, families and co-workers about us!We found that using a team of specialists is the best way to help clients achieve their goals. Our team concept is a win/win solution because clients will have a team of professionals focused on their goals...all for the price of ONE AGENT! Our clients love our level of personal service since each member is accountable for their area of specialty. Each of our team members focuses on their ONE THING so we are working together to achieve perfection.Our Mission StatementTO PROVIDE the best possible personal service to as many people as possible and build our database of long–term, satisfied clients.TO MAINTAIN a professional and efficient work environment which helps all of our team members achieve his or her personal goals and goals as a team.TO DEAL with the public fairly and honestly.TO SET a positive example and be well–respected, top producing members of the real estate community.Lux Property Group at Keller Williams Realty is here to help you with all of your real estate buying, selling and investing needs! List with Lux – http://listingsbylux.com/sell/Buy with Lux – http://www.SearchAllHouses.com

Responsible for the origination, processing, underwriting, closing and funding of residential and commercial mortgage loans.Trained loan officers and processors on the different aspects of the mortgage industry including loan programs and underwriting guidelines.  Assisted loan officers with marketing ideas and implementation to increase production.  Delegated underwriting authority with several investors through three mortgage insurance companies.Prepared and reviewed various production reports including projections and performance reviews.Managed warehouse line of $11,000,000.  Suggested new business associates and products that reduced company expenses by more than 50%.

November 4, 2013, Haney was a client of Carlie Kathleen’s

Carlie is a motivated, driven individual!  Carlie first partnered with me in 2001.  She has been a knowledgable resource, consultant and agent for me over the years regarding mortgage loans, real estate and insurance needs.  Just recently, I had a few simple questions.  Although we haven't partnered in several years, Carlie McChesney allowed me to pick her brain. In a brief moment of time Carlie had several ideas for me that would give me clarity on my issues of concern. She is committed to long term partnerships and helping individuals make the most cost effective decisions for their short term and long term needs.  Thank you Carlie Kathleen McChesney!
